data.title: Metareference in the Nineteenth-Century Pictorial Press and Beyond
data.meta_description: Metareference is a medial and semiotic phenomenon that occurs whenever a media product directs attention to its own medial and representational qualities. Usually associated with postmodern art and culture, metareference operates in the margins of media history. This...
